name: A Heart of Light
description:
Wanted to try something with shaders, so I created this minimalist game.

  • WASD to move.
  • R to restart
  • Go near characters to claim them.
  • Click characters to sacrifice them.
  • Make it to the end.

POST JAM FIXES

  1. Restarting and exiting
  2. Background sound
  3.  Added water collision and effect
  4. Fixed bug setting player active and having characters at the wrong Z
